title: Enchanting Emerald Chandbali Earrings with Polki Diamonds - పచ్చల చెంప సవరాలు
materials: Emeralds (estimated to be of good color saturation and clarity)
Polki Diamonds. Features a brilliant Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster.
features: Classic Chandbali design with intricate filigree detailing studded with uncut Polki diamonds. Features a floral motif top with a central emerald. A cascade of emeralds, each encircled by Polki diamonds, dangles gracefully, creating a mesmerizing effect. The open setting of the Polki diamonds allows maximum light reflection, enhancing their natural brilliance.
colors: Predominantly gold with vibrant green Emeralds and the sparkling white of Polki diamonds.
occasions: and other festive occasions. Adds a touch of timeless elegance to modern cocktail parties and grand celebrations.
description: A statement piece showcasing the rich heritage of Hyderabadi craftsmanship. The combination of Emeralds and Polki diamonds exudes opulence and sophistication. Handcrafted with meticulous attention to detail, these earrings are a testament to enduring quality and style, perfect for passing down as a treasured heirloom (వారసత్వం).
